question:
The term BRS Conventions, which was recently in news, is associated to:
  1. Hazardous Waste
  2. Persistent organic pollutants
  3. Wetlands
Select the correct option from codes given below:
explanation: The BRS Conventions stands for the (Basel, Rotterdam and Stockholm Conventions). It was recently in news because the three COPs to BRS Conventions are going to be held jointly and back-to-back from April 24-May 5, 2017 in Geneva, Switzerland. The theme of the meetings and the high-level segment is – "A future detoxified: sound management of chemicals and waste". India is committed towards its obligations of BRS Conventions. While the Basel Convention will discuss the control of transboundary movements of hazardous wastes and their disposal, the Rotterdam Convention will deliberate on the prior informed consent procedure for certain hazardous chemicals and pesticides in international trade" and the Stockholm Convention is on persistent organic pollutants (POPs)".
